description:
Yuta tries to decide what club to join, but Rikka is already a step ahead of him. She creates the "Far-Eastern Magic Society" and manages to rope in two members. Given a provisional club status, Yuta revokes his membership...until Shinka joins the club, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 異端なる... 双尾娘[ツインテール]
